item.title: How to become a verified BAT publisher
item.description: Ads and tracking software fill the web, which is an important factor in the bad experience of surfing the web sites and constitute a violation of privacy through the continuous tracking of users. That’s why browser extensions that block these ads have spread with varying efficiencies and effectiveness in performing that task. On the other hand, publishers need a business model that can finance their publishing platforms and ads are the main, if not the only source of revenue.

item.title: Setting up a custom domain for your GitHub Pages
item.description: GitHub provides a free static website hosting and GitHub subdomain services. GitHub can get an address for your website with a prefix corresponding to your username if the repository name of your site files has a prefix corresponding to your username and a similar username.github.io. For example, username           ibrmora repository name           ibrmora.
